key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges related to billing practices and compliance
Dependence on insurance providers and vulnerability to changes in reimbursement rates
High competition in the healthcare services industry
Exposure to market risks such as changes in interest rates
controversies: Historical allegations of granting in-the-money stock options
Legal issues related to employment practices and improper billing allegations
social_issues: Promotion of a supportive work environment for physicians
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges impacting governance
